Tesla's China-made EV sales jump 68.7% y/y in DecemberU.S. automaker Tesla sold 94,139 China-made electric vehicles (EVs) in December, a 68.7% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Wednesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 09:03:03 GMT 63X7QFWB5JLXJB2IHDPXKYHF5U https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/teslas-china-made-ev-sales-jump-687-yy-december-2024-01-03/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Tesla's China-made EV sales grow 68.7% y/y in DecemberU.S. automaker Tesla sold 94,139 China-made electric vehicles in December, a 68.7% increase from a year earlier, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Wednesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 08:40:36 GMT T7XU3HZQLNMHXHB6PCVG65KYCQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/teslas-china-made-ev-sales-grow-687-yy-december-2024-01-03/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Foreign funds accelerated China equity sell-off in December -Morgan StanleyGlobal long-only funds offloaded China equities at the fastest pace of 2023 in December as they rushed to meet redemption requests and to diversify away from the world's second-largest economy, according to Morgan Stanley analysts. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 08:04:57 GMT W2D23HU5H5MGLJQPIYMPVMEK5A https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/foreign-funds-accelerated-china-equity-sell-off-december-morgan-stanley-2024-01-03/Summer Zhen市场亚洲市场
China says it is willing to provide help to Japan on earthquakeChina is willing to provide necessary help to Japan on the massive earthquake that struck the country on New Year's Day, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 07:49:51 GMT 7A6SNU6RYNPA3DQG3BFJ5LKY7E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-is-willing-provide-help-japan-earthquake-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Exclusive: China's top banks tighten exposure to smaller peers to curb credit riskSome of China's top banks have sharpened scrutiny of smaller peers' asset quality and have tightened standards for interbank lending, three sources said, in an effort to curb credit risk as a deepening property debt crisis ripples through the economy. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 07:45:58 GMT ZC6YKBMTJNIBXFDZPOPEVYUQM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-top-banks-tighten-exposure-smaller-peers-curb-credit-risk-sources-say-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中国
China money managers rush to create funds tracking new A50 indexChinese money managers are rushing to create funds tracking the newly-launched CSI A50 Index, which analysts say is a better reflection of China's economic landscape and government priorities than the country's stock benchmarks. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:18:27 GMT 2HCUKEFU7ZPQZL4WTANZAEEHAE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-money-managers-rush-create-funds-tracking-new-a50-index-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中国
'Hawkish' China military squeeze on Taiwan likely after electionThe arms race across the Taiwan Strait and Chinese military pressure against the island Beijing claims as its "sacred" territory is unlikely to end no matter who wins Taiwan's closely watched elections. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:16:16 GMT Q5GSSYV47BIZZJOXQINDSSZS6M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hawkish-china-military-squeeze-taiwan-likely-after-election-2024-01-03/Yew Lun Tian, James Pomfret世界亚太地区
Overseas figures refute allegations in Hong Kong security trial for Jimmy LaiSeveral overseas activists, right campaigners and politicians named in a national security trial for Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai refuted allegations levelled by a government prosecutor in court that they colluded with him. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:01:14 GMT LWWCLGPMKZNELNTNP2IPCPPDWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/overseas-figures-refute-allegations-hong-kong-security-Trial-jimmy-lai-2024-01-03/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界中国
China's BYD to give dealers 2 billion yuan for hitting sales target - sourcesBYD , which outsold Tesla in electric car sales globally for the first time in the fourth quarter, will hand out rewards totaling billions of yuan to its Chinese dealers, according to two dealers with knowledge of the matter. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 05:11:21 GMT 35NWIFYQHFNNLNYUNY2UPVKLNY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-byd-give-dealers-2-bln-yuan-hitting-sales-target-sources-2024-01-03/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China unveils new images of its next-generation aircraft carrierChinese state media unveiled new images of China's most advanced aircraft carrier yet, including next generation launch tracks that can catapult a wider range of aircraft from its deck. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:02:17 GMT QR3ILMVCYVLRLEYTFDZE3GHK6U https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-unveils-new-images-its-next- Generation-aircraft-carrier-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中国
Chinese official urges Taiwan's people to make 'correct choice' on electionA senior Chinese official on Wednesday urged Taiwan's people to make a "correct choice" on the island's upcoming elections, which he described as being about peace and war, prosperity and decline. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 02:50:28 GMT 7丹西法克NLZHP24BQJJPZ7H6M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-official-urges-taiwans-people-make- Correct-choice-election-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
